package.name: thunderbird
package.unpack: tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.tar.bz2 mkdir l10n tar -C l10n -xJf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.de-es-pl-ru.tar.xz tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/enigmail-1.6.tar.gz
package.build:
workdir=` pwd ` cd comm-esr24 echo $SHELL export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL sed -i "s%with-l10n-base=\.\.%with-l10n-base=${workdir}/l10n%g" .mozconfig if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j2\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j${jobcount} CC='distcc gcc' CXX='distcc g++'\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure pump make -f client.mk build else make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure make -f client.mk build fi echo '===> Trying to find libxul.so...' find tb-build -type f -name libxul.so
ccount=0 while [ '!' -f tb-build/mozilla/toolkit/library/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] ; do echo '===> Linking libxul.so failed, trying again in 5 minutes...' sleep 300 make -f client.mk build ccount=` expr $ccount + 1 ` done [ -f tb-build/mozilla/toolkit/library/libxul.so ] || exit 1
# Now try to build the language packs for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do make -C tb-build/mail/locales langpack-${packlang} done
# Now try to build the xpi of thunderbird mv mail/installer/removed-files.in{,.orig} cat mail/installer/removed-files.in.orig | sed 's%hyphenation/hyph%# hyphenation/hyph%g' > mail/installer/removed-files.in make -C tb-build package
# Now build Enigmail and package Enigmail mv ../enigmail mailnews/extensions/ ( cd mailnews/extensions/enigmail/ ; perl makemake -r ) make -C tb-build/mailnews/extensions/enigmail/ make -C tb-build/mailnews/extensions/enigmail/ xpi
echo '==> Searching XPIs' find tb-build -name '*.xpi' | sort
package.install:
TARFILE=comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.en-US.linux-i686.tar.bz2 LIBXUL=comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/toolkit/library/libxul.so ENIGMAILVERSION=1.6 [ -f "$TARFILE" ] || exit 1 [ -f "$LIBXUL" ] || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons tar -C ${TGTDIR}/opt -xvjf "${TARFILE}" mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}
echo '====> Installing XPIs' install -m 0644 comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/xpi-stage/gdata-provider-*.en-US.linux-i686.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons install -m 0644 comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/xpi-stage/lightning-*.en-US.linux-i686.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons
# for xpi in gdata-provider lightning calendar-timezones ; do # install -m 0644 comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/xpi-stage/${xpi}.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons # mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/${xpi} # ( cd ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/${xpi} ; unzip ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons/${xpi}.xpi ) # done # mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/lightning ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/'{e2fda1a4-762b-4020-b5ad-a41df1933103}' # mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/gdata-provider ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/'{a62ef8ec-5fdc-40c2-873c-223b8a6925cc}' # mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/calendar-timezones ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/'calendar-timezones@mozilla.org'
echo '====> Installing Langpacks' mkdir -m 0755 -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do # mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/langpack-${packlang}'@thunderbird.mozilla.org' install -m 0644 comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/linux-i686/xpi/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi \ ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization # ( cd ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/langpack-${packlang}'@thunderbird.mozilla.org' ; # unzip ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi ) done
echo '====> Installing Enigmail' # mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/'{847b3a00-7ab1-11d4-8f02-006008948af5}' mkdir -m 0755 -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons install -m 0644 comm-esr24/tb-build/mozilla/dist/bin/enigmail-${ENIGMAILVERSION}-linux-i686.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons/
# ( cd ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/extensions/'{847b3a00-7ab1-11d4-8f02-006008948af5}' ; # unzip ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons/enigmail-${ENIGMAILVERSION}-linux-i686.xpi )
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons install -m 0644 ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/chrome/icons/default/default256.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/thunderbird256.png echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird << TBRUN #!/bin/sh
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT"
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$langopts \$@
if [ "\$#" -lt 1 ] ; then exec sudo /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack else if ps waux | grep 'surfer /opt/.*/thunderbird-bin' | grep -v grep ; then /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$@ else sudo /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack & sleep 5 exec /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$@ fi fi
TBRUN
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack << TBSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT"
/static/sbin/newsmack internet /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$langopts"
TBSMACK
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack /sbin/paxctl -m -r ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird-bin
